Articles.Content:
I've only recently started getting into KSP, picked it up very early on and messed around with it in sandbox, but it's changed so much since then.

I've been struggling to get a ship decently into orbit in career mode so i decided to try the tutorials, but i'm unable to continue the advanced construction because there's no "Swivel" engine in the parts list.

From what I've read this tutorial later goes into the action groups which is completely new to me so I'd like to be able to reach that part.

Can anyone try the tutorial in a vanilla install and see if the Swivel engine is also missing for you?

Is bug reporting still being tracked? I realize development has all pretty much moved on to KSP2, but could a couple devs make some time to go through the tutorials and make sure they're all working?

1.12.2 revamped the Swivel and Reliant engines, and like with other part revamps the old parts were hidden but are still in the game files to prevent craft from breaking.

Sort by part manufacturers in the advanced mode in the VAB with the arrow in the top left of the part menu, and the old Swivel should be somewhere in there.
Thread moved to the support subforum.
